channel.title: Timer for Castle Wars
channel.description: Just wondering what is the most efficient way to make a timer for the castle wars waiting room, and during play. I don't want to use process.

item.title: Timer for Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Run an cycle-based event that will be called nonstop whenever a player enters the room and there is nobody in the room. The event, each cycle, should do the neccessary checks. This could also be applied for during play. It should be activated when there are no players in the waiting room, and somebody requests to enter the room; when somebody leaves the waiting room, and there are no more players the event should be canceled. Same goes with the castle wars game.

Read full topic

item.title: Timer for Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

tyb97:

Issue with that idea. As soon as they are even it would start, meaning 2 people may get in, then it starts, leaving the others stranded.

If there’s an event system for your base, try that
or you could set it so that each team needs a minimum of 2-3 players.
or something like that and then delay it… =p

Read full topic

I don’t know.
